title: MasterCard's MATCH API SDK - Unofficial
description: This is a duplication of MasterCard-Match, but has compatibility to .NET Core.

packOptions.summary: This is the Mastercard SDK for the service: MasterCard-Match
packOptions.releaseNotes:
101.1.11 - Update to use Mastercard-Core-Unofficial v101.1.11. Also added TerminationInquiryHistoryRequestJSON object.
101.1.10 - Update to use Mastercard-Core-Unofficial v101.1.10
101.1.9 - Update to use Mastercard-Core-Unofficial v101.1.9
101.1.8 - Added support for IndividualApiConfig
101.1.7 - Added requirement of MasterCard-Core-Unofficial.v101.1.7
101.1.6 - Fixed TerminationInquiryHistoryRequest (To get the IRN use the TerminationInquiry​.Ref from TerminationInquiryRequest and parse it from the URL in that field.)
